frontend.title: Set contract address in frontend constants
frontend.body:
The frontend currently has a TODO to set the deployed contract address. Update `frontend/src/utils/constants.ts` to read the contract address from the environment and document the env var in the README.

Acceptance criteria:
- Contract address is read from env (e.g., VITE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS)
- Update `frontend/README.md` or project README with setup instructions

frontend.title: Add environment configuration instructions for Supabase
frontend.body: Supabase credential placeholders exist in `frontend/src/services/supabase.ts`. Add clear instructions to the frontend README on how to create a `.env` or `.env.local` file and required variables (SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON_KEY).

frontend.title: Implement online status in chat service
frontend.body: `frontend/src/services/chatService.ts` has a TODO comment for online status. Implement presence/online status using Supabase presence or socket, and add tests or mock to demonstrate behavior.

frontend.title: Add unit tests for `usePostNFT` hook
frontend.body: Add Jest/React Testing Library unit tests for `frontend/src/hooks/usePostNFT.ts`. Cover creating a post, fetching posts and error handling.

frontend.title: Add E2E test for creating a post
frontend.body: Add a Playwright or Cypress E2E test that verifies the full create post flow (sign in, upload to IPFS mock, create post).

frontend.title: Improve accessibility on post creation modal
frontend.body: Audit `CreatePostModal` and ensure form inputs have labels, aria attributes, focus management and keyboard navigation.

frontend.title: Add component docs or Storybook for `PostCard`
frontend.body: Add Storybook stories or component docs for `frontend/src/components/Feed/PostCard.tsx` so contributors can preview and iterate on UI components.

frontend.title: Add input validations on create post form
frontend.body: Ensure the Create Post form validates content length and displays helpful error messages; add tests for validation behavior.

frontend.title: Lazy-load images and optimize asset loading
frontend.body: Optimize image assets used in feeds by lazy-loading and adding smaller thumbnails to improve performance on mobile devices.

frontend.title: Add CI to run frontend tests and lint
frontend.body: Add GitHub Actions to run `yarn install`, `yarn lint` and `yarn test` for the frontend on PRs.

frontend.title: Document local dev startup steps for frontend
frontend.body: Extend README to include step-by-step front-end dev environment setup (install, env vars, run, build) and how to link to local contract addresses for dev workflows.

frontend.title: Add consistent error toast messages across UI
frontend.body: Ensure errors from contract interactions and IPFS uploads show consistent toast messages using existing `use-toast` hook.

frontend.title: Add TypeScript types and improve typing in services
frontend.body: There are a few any/implicit types in service files like `ipfs.ts` and `contract.ts`â€”improve typing and add unit tests to guard behavior.

frontend.title: Add contributing guide section for frontend
frontend.body: Add a frontend-specific CONTRIBUTING.md or a section in main README documenting how to run dev environment, run tests, and how to make a PR that touches the frontend.

frontend.title: Make contract ABI loading configurable
frontend.body: Enable the frontend to load the contract ABI from a configurable path or fetch from a central location so ABI changes are easy to propagate.

frontend.title: Add network switch UX when user is on wrong chain
frontend.body: Improve wallet connect behavior and prompt the user with a clear message and button to switch to Base Sepolia/Mainnet as appropriate.

frontend.title: Add linting and formatting pre-commit hook
frontend.body: Add Husky/pre-commit hook to run `yarn lint` and `yarn format` to improve PR quality and consistency.

frontend.title: Add a local mock backend for dev
frontend.body: Provide a small mock server or fixtures to allow contributors to run the app locally without requiring deployed contracts or live Supabase for faster onboarding.

frontend.title: Audit and fix console warnings and unused imports
frontend.body: Run the app and fix console warnings and remove unused imports; add a lint rule to treat warnings as errors in CI.

frontend.title: Add rate-limiting and spam-prevention for posts
frontend.body: Add server-side or client-side mechanisms to prevent spam posts and abusive usage patterns; document considerations for threshold and testing.

smartcontract.title: Add NatSpec comments to public contract functions
smartcontract.body: Improve contract documentation by adding NatSpec comments to `OnePostNFT.sol` functions and events so developers and users can understand their behavior.

smartcontract.title: Add unit tests for marketplace edge cases
smartcontract.body: Add tests covering expiration logic, propose/cancel/buy race conditions, and invalid price handling in `test/OnePostNFT.t.sol`.

smartcontract.title: Add fuzz tests for token transfers and royalties
smartcontract.body: Use Foundry `forge` fuzz tests to validate royalties distribution across many inputs and ensure no unexpected behavior with large values.

smartcontract.title: Create a GitHub Action to run Foundry tests on PRs
smartcontract.body: Add CI workflow that installs Foundry and runs `forge test` on PRs to prevent regressions.

smartcontract.title: Add Slither or MythX static analysis job
smartcontract.body: Add a security static analysis step using Slither or a similar tool to detect common solidity issues and report results in CI.

smartcontract.title: Improve require messages and custom errors
smartcontract.body: Replace generic `require` messages or add custom errors in `OnePostNFT.sol` to make failure modes clearer and cheaper gas-wise.

smartcontract.title: Add gas usage tests and snapshot comparisons
smartcontract.body: Add scripts to measure gas usage for key functions (createPost, buyPost) and store gas snapshots to track regression.

smartcontract.title: Add contract verification workflow
smartcontract.body: Add a workflow or script to verify contracts automatically on Base explorers after deployment (use `forge verify-contract` or similar).

smartcontract.title: Add tests to validate royalty distribution exactly 5%
smartcontract.body: Write tests that assert the 5% royalty is applied on secondary sales and rounding/edge cases are handled correctly.

smartcontract.title: Document contract upgradeability considerations
smartcontract.body: Create a doc that explains whether the contracts are intended to be upgradeable and steps to migrate if needed.

smartcontract.title: Add more comprehensive MockBASE token tests
smartcontract.body: Extend tests around `MockBASE.sol` minting, allowances, and transfer behavior, including edge cases.

smartcontract.title: Add a gas-optimized alternative implementation for heavy ops
smartcontract.body: Identify heavy operations and propose a gas-optimized alternative; add tests and benchmarks to compare.

smartcontract.title: Add security-focused test scenarios (reentrancy, replays)
smartcontract.body: Add tests and scripts that attempt common attacks (reentrancy, replay) to validate protections like ReentrancyGuard are effective.

smartcontract.title: Add contribution guide for smartcontract devs
smartcontract.body: Add a CONTRIBUTING section for `packages/smartcontract` that explains how to run tests, formatting, and open a PR with foundry artifacts.

smartcontract.title: Add a test to check for correct access control
smartcontract.body: Ensure admin-only functions are protected and write tests that assert only owner can perform privileged operations.

smartcontract.title: Add a script to deploy to Sepolia/Base testnet with verification
smartcontract.body: Provide a documented script or `forge` command snippets that deploy and verify contracts to Base Sepolia as part of release steps.

smartcontract.title: Add test to validate marketplace expiration behavior
smartcontract.body: Test the expiration behavior for sales proposals (7-day expiry) and ensure the contract handles expiry correctly even with multiple proposals.

smartcontract.title: Add instructions for running a local Anvil node for testing
smartcontract.body: Add step-by-step instructions in the smartcontract README about running `anvil` and connecting the frontend locally for integration testing.

smartcontract.title: Add a gas-report workflow and CI artifact
smartcontract.body: Add a workflow that runs gas reports (e.g. via forge or third-party) and stores gas snapshots as CI artifacts to track regressions.

smartcontract.title: Create a formal verification checklist
smartcontract.body: Draft a formal verification and audit checklist for key contract functions and document the steps needed before mainnet deployments.
